document_data.mainbody:
ison-gourd was a flowering plant common on Pelleors Prairie surrounding the Hill of Lost Souls. 
The oils harvested from this plants seeds were hard to smell but could be used as a natural insect repellent. It should be noted that only normal-sized insects were repelled by the oil larger insects or swarms were not affected in the least.  
Bison-gourd covered large areas of the prairie with runners that were usually dozens of feet long. This plant produced large yellow flowers that were shaped like trumpets. The flowers produced a fruit that could grow up to  long.
